name: Google reCAPTCHA v2 checkbox and invisible badge
description:
Quickly add Google reCAPTCHA v2 verification component to your design system, and mock-ups, with these faithful vector recreations combined as variants.

Included are interactive features - the two components are instantly ready for your prototypes as interaction between variants is built-in.


"I'm not a robot" checkbox

The checkbox includes default, hover, loading, ticked, error and expired states.

Interactive behaviour includes:

  • hover changes from default to hover variant
  • animated loading on click and, after a brief delay, changes to the ticked state.
  • Default changes to expired variant after a delay if not interacted with.
  • Privacy and terms link out to the relevant google pages.


Invisible reCAPTCHA badge

The invisible badge version has the default and hover states available.

Interactive behaviour includes:

  • hover changes between the two variants
  • Privacy and terms link out to the relevant google pages.
